## FloatVector.innerProduct() method

Implements the inner product (scalar product or dot product) of two vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
innerProduct(other: Vector<number>): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | <code>Vector&lt;number&gt;</code> | The vector with which to calculate an inner product |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

The inner product
